Action.author: arsulegai
Action.body: Was the max_batches_per_block setting used to limit number of batches in a block?

Action.author: arsulegai
Action.body: Is there a log saved with debug trace from validator at this time?

Action.author: arsulegai
Action.body: Thanks, do you also have a log from other validators/PoET?

Action.author: rranjan3
Action.body: Uploaded logs for one other peer. All xyz*_1* are the ones from the other peer.

Action.author: arsulegai
Action.body: The PR https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/2186 helps to notify administrator that a TP is missing. This issue is concluded to happen because of missing TP in the docker-compose file used to test.
